      • getMobReward

        public java.util.List<Action> getMobReward(org.bukkit.entity.Player killer,
                                  MobQuery query)
                                    throws ParsingException
        Retrieves a list of action rewards that applies when a mob is killed, either by the environment (when KILLER is NULL), or by a player.

        Note that the returned list contains every possible reward that matches the given mob. In reality, only the first item will be awarded.

        Parameters:
        killer - - the player that killed this mob, or NULL if the mob died naturally.
        query - - query representing the mob that was killed.
        Returns:
        A list of possible rewards. Only the first item will be chosen when rewards are actually awarded.
        Throws:
        ParsingException - If the stored preset option associated with the killer is malformed.

      • getPlayerReward

        public java.util.List<Action> getPlayerReward(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                     java.lang.Integer trigger,
                                     Query query)
                                       throws ParsingException
        Retrieves a list of action rewards that applies when a player performs a given action to the item or block specified by the query.

        The query must be a ItemQuery for every trigger except brewing, where it also can be a PotionQuery.

        Also note that this list contains every possible reward that matches the given parameters. In reality, only the first item will be awarded.

        Parameters:
        player - - player performing the given action, or NULL if the default configuration file should be used.
        trigger - - action the player performs.
        query - - query representing the item or block that was the target of the action.
        Returns:
        A list of possible rewards. Only the first item will be chosen when rewards are actually awarded.
        Throws:
        ParsingException - If the stored preset option associated with this player is malformed.
